item.title: Greeting
item.description: Hello! This is first post in CheckInTmn site. This post is new post and have some info. I hope hugo show summary of this post on main page. May be it will be truncated or not, i dont know. In docs written that it will be truncated to 70 symbols (or may be words?). I try to write some more text to test post summary. I try to write some more text to test post summary. I try to write some more text to test post summary. I try to write some more text to test post summary. I try to write some more text to test post summary. I try to write some more text to test post summary. I try to write some more text to test post summary. Yeap! It works!
